comment.author: 56714904@N02
comment._content: I don't think this place ever got built...at least, not with that name.  The oil embargo hit the construction industry hard in Puerto Rico, and many projects had to be scrapped.

comment.author: 31853465@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/jurobi] It did got built - "Luquillo Seaside Condominium" is not the name of the project, this is an ad for Playa Azul complex. My family bought one back then, still own it.
